h1_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
h2_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide
content: He will start to attack using white projectiles, which can be dodged or outrun. When you've got his health down to around 60-70%, he will use the white and black orbs to summon undead enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeper_of_the_Flaming_Mountains_and_Yin-Yang_Fish.md', within the main section titled 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish', specifically from the subsection 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He will start to attack using white projectiles, which can be dodged or outrun. When you've got his health down to around 60-70%, he will use the white and black orbs to summon undead enemies.
